data.title: EastEnders‚Äô Lisa Faulkner announces engagement to MasterChef‚Äôs John Torode
data.meta_description: EastEnders actress Lisa Faulkner and MasterChef host John Torode are engaged after John popped the question to Lisa on Christmas Day.
data.text:
It turned out to be a Christmas Day to remember for EastEnders actress Lisa Faulkner when her partner, MasterChef's John Torode, proposed to her!

Announcing the couple's happy news on social media, Lisa shared a cute photo of the pair and wrote, 'My gorgeous John completely surprised me on Christmas Day and asked me to marry him! After waiting to tell our family when we got home we then had a few days just grinning at each other!! Im so very happy to share our lovely news with you. Happy 2019 it‚Äôs going to be quite a year and I‚Äôm going to embrace every minute of it. All you need is love. Love is all you need. ‚ù§Ô∏èüíç‚ù§Ô∏èüíç‚ù§Ô∏èüíç‚ù§Ô∏è'. [sic]

John, who presents hit show MasterChef alongside Greg Wallace, later shared a photo of Lisa standing next to a swimming pool. He wrote, 'And she said YES !! Bloody love my Lisa .. Have put a ring on it üíçüï∫üèº'. [sic]

Fans were quick to comment on the couple's news, one user wrote, 'üíç‚ù§Congratulations to you both xx', with another adding, 'Congrats to you both, such great news! Xox'. [sic]

John and Lisa first met way back in 2010 when Lisa appeared and later went on to win the Celebrity version of MasterChef.

When Lisa divorced her ex-husband Chris Coghill in 2012, and John split from his ex-wife Jessica, the pair started in dating in 2012.

Pop superstar Ed Sheeran asked his long-term girlfriend Cherry Seaborn to marry him in January. He wrote on Instagram, 'Got myself a fianc√© just before new year. We are very happy and in love, and our cats are chuffed as well xx' [sic]

Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin

Justin Bieber popped the question to model Hailey Baldwin in July 2018 when the pair were on holiday in Barbados.

3 of 9

CREDIT: u00a9 Instagram

Helen Flanagan and Scott Sinclair

Celtic FC footballer Scott Sinclair proposed to Coronation Street actress Helen Flanagan in Disneyland, just weeks before the couple's second child was due to arrive.

4 of 9

CREDIT: u00a9 Instagram

Chris Zylka and Paris Hilton

American actor Chris Zylka proposed to Paris Hilton during a romantic skiing trip in Aspen in January.She wrote on Instagram, 'I said Yas! ud83dudc70ud83cudffcud83dudc85ud83cudffcud83dudc8dud83dudc8e So happy & excited to be engaged to the love of my life. My best friend & soulmate. Perfect for me in every way. So dedicated, loyal, loving & kindhearted. I feel like the luckiest girl in the world! You are my dream come true! Thank you for showing me that fairytales do exist.ud83dude0d'. [sic]

5 of 9

CREDIT: u00a9 Instagram

Lisa Riley

Loose Women star Lisa Riley announced her secret boyfriend had proposed to her in May. Sharing a photo of herself to Instagram, Lisa wrote, 'Yes I can now confirm the rumours are true... I have got engaged... My soul mate and best mate and love of my life Al is the best thing to have ever happened to me... We have absolutely NO date set for ANY wedding day, just happy together... Zero fuss, just firmed our togethernessud83dude18.'

6 of 9

CREDIT: u00a9 Instagram

Lea Michele and Zandy Reich

Glee actress Lea Michele confirmed her boyfriend Zandy Reich proposed to her, showing off her stunning diamond ring on Instagram.

7 of 9

CREDIT: u00a9 REX/Shutterstock and Instagram

Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews

After meeting on The Jump, former Made In Chelsea lothario Spencer Matthews popped the question to his model girlfriend Vogue Williams. The couple are now expecting their first child together.

8 of 9

CREDIT: u00a9 Instagram

Jade Ewen and Daniel de Bourg

Sugababes singer Jade Ewen revealed to her fans that her actor boyfriend Daniel de Bourg had proposed to her on Valentine's Day.

9 of 9

Oliver Proudlock and Emma Louise Connolly

Made In Chelsea star Oliver Proudlock popped the question to his model girlfriend Emma Louise Connolly. Proudlock proposed as the pair celebrated their four-year anniversary in Sweden.
